segments.source_content: # Change Requests

translations.zh-CN: # 变更请求

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Change requests are part of our Scale-Up and Enterprise plans.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

变更请求功能属于我们的Scale-Up和企业版套餐。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Overview

translations.zh-CN: ## 概述

segments.source_content:
You can use Change Requests to add workflow control to the changing of Flag values. Change Requests allow a user to
propose a change to a flag value, and then require that change is approved by a number of other team members.

translations.zh-CN: 您可以通过变更请求功能为特征值修改添加工作流管控。该功能允许用户提交特征值修改提案，并需要获得指定数量的团队成员批准后才能生效。

segments.source_content:
You can use Change Requests to ensure that, for example, a change to a flag in Production has to be approved by another
team member. They work in a similar way to Pull Requests in git.

translations.zh-CN: 例如，您可以要求生产环境中任何特征值的修改都必须经过另一位团队成员审批。其运作机制类似于git中的Pull Request流程。

segments.source_content: ## Setting up Change Requests

translations.zh-CN: ## 配置变更请求

segments.source_content:
Change Requests are configured at the Environment level. To enable Change Requests, go to the Environment Settings Page,
Enable 4 Eyes Change Request Approvals, and select how many approvals you would like for each Change Request to be
applied.

translations.zh-CN: 变更请求在环境级别进行配置。启用该功能需前往环境设置页面，开启"四眼原则变更审批"选项，并设置每个变更请求所需的审批人数。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_b7a64917

segments.source_content: ## Creating a Change Request

translations.zh-CN: ## 创建变更请求

segments.source_content:
:::info

Any user that has permission to _Update_ a Feature within the Environment can create a Change Request

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info

任何拥有环境内特征_更新_权限的用户均可创建变更请求

:::

segments.source_content:
Once an Environment is configured with Change Requests enabled, attempting to change a flag value will prompt you to
create a new Change Request.

translations.zh-CN: 当环境启用变更请求功能后，尝试修改特征值时系统将提示您创建新的变更请求。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_e7c54101

segments.source_content: You will need to provide:

translations.zh-CN: 您需要提供：

segments.source_content:
- The title of the Change Request
- Optionally a description of the reason for the Change Request
- Any number of assignees. These people will receive an email alerting them of the Change Request

translations.zh-CN:
- 变更请求标题
- （可选）变更原因说明
- 任意数量的审批人，这些成员将收到变更请求的邮件通知

segments.source_content: ## Approving a Change Request

translations.zh-CN: ## 审批变更请求

segments.source_content:
:::info

Any user that has permission to write to the Environment containing the Change Request can approve it.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info

任何对包含变更请求的环境具有写入权限的用户均可进行审批。

:::

segments.source_content: Change Requests awaiting approval are listed in the Change Request area.

translations.zh-CN: 待审批的变更请求会列在变更请求专区中。

segments.source_content: ![Listing Change Requests](/img/change-request-list.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![变更请求列表](/img/change-request-list.png)

segments.source_content: Clicking on a Change Request brings up the details of the request, and the current and new Flag values.

translations.zh-CN: 点击具体变更请求可查看详情，包括当前值与拟修改值对比。

segments.source_content: ![Approving a Change Requests](/img/change-request-approve.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![审批变更请求](/img/change-request-approve.png)

segments.source_content: ## Publishing a Change Request

translations.zh-CN: ## 发布变更请求

segments.source_content: When the required number of approvals have been made, you will be able to publish the Change Request.

translations.zh-CN: 当达到要求的审批人数后，您即可发布该变更请求。

segments.source_content: ![Publishing a Change Requests](/img/change-request-publish.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![发布变更请求](/img/change-request-publish.png)

segments.source_content: The Change Request will immediately come into effect once the Publish Change button is clicked.

translations.zh-CN: 点击"发布变更"按钮后，修改将立即生效。
